question: 自動販売機
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Automatic</kanji> (<ja>自動</ja>) <kanji>sell</kanji> <kanji>sell</kanji> <kanji>machine</kanji>. The machine sells things by itself, basically. This is a <vocabulary>vending machine</vocabulary>. There is a shorter version of this, but good to learn the long one first :)
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which means on'yomi readings from the kanji. Remember those, and you'll be fine here.
